channel.title: I guess 99999999999999999 is a bad #
channel.description:
Loaded WorldMap In (125 ms)... Demise PK'ing has been activated... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "9 9999999999999999" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:461) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:282) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:125)
i saved a big number , 17 9s in a row lol i tried to lower it alot but it still comes up with this, even though all those 9s i put in for an item are gone. i replaced them with smaller numbers like in the first place. help? im so close to finishing, id have it within an hour >.< if you know somebody who can help but that isn't you direct them my way! XD thanks.

item.title: I guess 99999999999999999 is a bad #
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

deathschaos9:

Remove those 4 items from the file, run the source and see if the problem goes away, if it does, re-add the items carefully.

it was only bronze plate, legs, kite, and longsword. im just gonna get rid of for good
no actually thatll prolly cause more problems lol. i still have the original rar file so i will just snatch those 4 things outta there. thanks for the idea i would rep all of you if i could/needed it but i cant

EDIT believe it or not, smart me fixed 5 items and only put 4 under that number. i feel really stupid. sorry everyone for putting you on this random trail lol. thank you for the help everyone! i dont know what i would do without you! hopefully i wont need you guys eventually (not in a bad way ;P) thank you!

Read full topic

item.title: I guess 99999999999999999 is a bad #
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

deathschaos9:

Perhaps you have a problem with the spacing of the numbers, are you sure each one is separated by a tab? Not spaces. That would also throw NumberFormatException.

the place i messed up was in the item.cfg file, and it only has tabs not any spaces. i only did it to 4 items luckily lol. but the problem isnt solved yet.

Read full topic

item.title: I guess 99999999999999999 is a bad #
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

I Vain I:

Remember to compile.

i did, the compile was good, it said nothing, only when i start the source

item.title: I guess 99999999999999999 is a bad #
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

deathschaos9:

Java’s maximum integer is 2147483647 or (2^31) - 1. Make sure that all your numbers are lower than that.

well the thing is i changed all of that lower, below that number, and it still comes up with that error.

EDIT i missed one rofl that was the problem

Read full topic
